page.title: 16HOUSING EVESHAM
page.content: THE FOUR POOLS ESTATE EVESHAM After remaining the same size for many years this town is suddenly growing rapidly. The new buildings are all on the south side of the town where there is plenty of flat land between the Cheltenham and Broadway roads. The old parts of the town are a jumble of different types of land use but here the District Council has planned separate areas for HOUSING private and council INDUSTRY and warehouses EDUCATION schools and college RECREATION swimming pool and squash courts
